Projects.name: Flex Panels
Projects.description: Flex panels for gallery type thingy. Nothing complicated, just a bunch of 💪📦's.

Projects.name: Type Ahead
Projects.description: Find stuff and update results while typing in the 🔍📦 Updating results live in a list bellow.

Projects.name: JS/CSS Variables
Projects.description: Edit CSS variables 🎨 with JS. Pretty self explanatory. Can edit 🥕 color, 🔥 blur and ⚖️ scale. All while updating view 🔴 live.

Projects.name: Smart Counter
Projects.description: ⏲️ Counter w/ local storage 💾 - similar principle as the color-flipper project BUT involves storing, reading and clearing 🏚️ local browser storage.

Projects.name: Analog Clock
Projects.description: A not so 🦾 mechanical analog clock 🕥. Complete with digital counters and smooth arm 👉 action.

Projects.name: Drum Kit
Projects.description: 🥁 🎹 App that allows you to play basic sounds to create 🔥 awesome hit songs.

Projects.name: Color Flipper
Projects.description: 🟥 🟩 🟦 No explanation needed. An app that switches colors at the push of the 👇🚀 button. Pretty self explanatory.

Projects.name: Array Cardio 1
Projects.description: Practice run ⛏️ filtering out massive 💼 arrays of data to sort, order and display items on demand.
